reviewText: Local people letting the viewer in on how to make easy homestyle Hawaii dishes. It's great entertainment even if you don't plan to actually cook!
Awesome DVD series and done very well. Brings the islands to the main land.

A great DVD companion to their cookbook with the same title - This DVD really made me homesick....it features some of my favorite foods and made by some amazing Hawaii celebrities....  If you are into Hawaii and Hawaii food, the DVD's and Cookbook will make a great addition to your collection.

If you miss home - living in Hawaii or just love Hawaii, this dvd is for you. It is packed with 12 episodes featuring some of Hawaii's top chefs and celebrities... I love the fact that this DVD features real people from Hawaii - pidgeon english and all! I gave these away to family and friends in the mainland.
